sentences.sentence: Do Bodhisattvas adorn Buddha lands (by their moral actions)?
All Buddhas and Bodhisattvas, Dharma Masters and Dharma Friends, Amitabha.
sentences.translation: 诸佛菩萨、各位法师、各位佛友：阿弥陀佛！

sentences.sentence: In my experience, there are Buddhas and bodhisattvas present here, in our midst.
sentences.translation: 以我的经验，现在我们中间就有佛和菩萨。
